config.voxyworldgenv2.title: Voxy World Gen V2 Config
config.voxyworldgenv2.option.radius.tool: The radius (in chunks) around players to generate.
Maximum number of chunk generation tasks to start per server tick.
config.voxyworldgenv2.option.tps_thresho: Generation pauses if server TPS drops below this.
config.voxyworldgenv2.option.update_inte: How often to scan for new ungenerated chunks.
config.voxyworldgenv2.option.max_queue.t: Maximum number of chunks to keep in the pending queue.
Maximum number of chunks generating simultaneously. Match this to your CPU threads.
